mapper.title: Add a concept
mapper.description: Click "ADD CONCEPT" to add a concept for your new course.

mapper.title: Open course tray
mapper.description: Click the floating arrow button to open or close the course tray. The course tray lets you choose courses that are prerequisites for the current course.

mapper.title: Create another course
mapper.description: Create a new course that is a prerequisite for the course you created first.

mapper.title: Mark a course as a prerequisite
mapper.description: Add a course to the prerequisites of the current course by clicking the checkbox next to the course name in the course tray.

mapper.title: Add a concept to the new course
mapper.description: Add a concept to the newly created prerequisite course.

mapper.title: Draw a link from a prerequisite
mapper.description: Click a right-pointing triangle to start drawing a link, then click another triangle to create the link.

mapper.title: Focus a concept
mapper.description: Click on a concept to focus it and highlight links from it. When links are highlighted, you can click them to open its context menu to delete it.

manager.title: New course
manager.description: Enter the name for a new course.

manager.title: New course
manager.description: Enter themes for the new course. Type a theme and then press ENTER or TAB to finish it.

manager.title: New course
manager.description: Finally, click "CREATE" to create the course.

manager.title: Open a course
manager.description: Click a course to view and manage its concepts.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: Enter the name for a new concept.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: Enter a description for the new concept.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: Enter tags for the new course.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: Finally, click "CREATE" to create the concept.

graph.title: Course filtering
graph.description: This list lets you show and hide specific courses in the graph. It also shows the course color that concepts are colored with.

graph.title: Zoom
graph.description: This slider can be used to zoom in and out of the graph. You can also use your mouse wheel to zoom.

graph.title: Switch to course view
graph.description: The default view is the concept graph, but this button lets you switch to the course graph. The same button in the course graph will switch back to the concept graph.

graph.title: Reset layout
graph.description: This button resets the graph layout. If you hide or show courses in the course filter list, you can click this to fix the layout.

graph.title: Reset zoom
graph.description: This button resets the zoom to the original level.

heatmap.title: Course cell
heatmap.description: The color of the cells show how strong of a dependency the target course (row) has on the prerequisite course (column). When hovering over a cell, you see the list of concepts.
